headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SCHLOSS, FRANCES ANNE

lead_paragraph: SCHLOSS--Frances Anne. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Frances Anne Schloss, beloved wife of the late Harold Schloss. Frances's profound generosity continues through a Lion of Judah Endowment and the generosity of her children. We extend our deepest condolences to Frances's children, Robert (Emily) and Linda; grandchildren; and entire family Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; John S. Ruskay, Executive VP & CEO
